about.short: Spider-Man 2 brings Peter Parker and Miles Morales together in a thrilling new adventure, facing Venom and other iconic villains.
about.full: In Marvel’s Spider-Man 2, developed by Insomniac Games, players can quickly switch between Peter Parker and Miles Morales as they fight to save New York City. With the rise of the symbiote threat, the two Spider-Men must balance their lives, friendships, and the responsibility of being heroes. Explore a larger New York, including Brooklyn and Queens, wield new powers like Web Wings and Symbiote Surge, and face iconic villains like Venom, Kraven the Hunter, and Lizard.

tips: Use Web Wings to glide across NYC for massive speed boosts, especially when chaining wind tunnels.
Switch between Peter and Miles during free roam to take advantage of their unique abilities.
Use Symbiote Surge (Peter) and Chain Lightning (Miles) to clear large enemy groups quickly.
Complete FNSM App missions early to unlock powerful gadgets and suits.
Use stealth arenas to perform perch takedowns and web lines for silent multi-enemy takedowns.
Upgrade traversal abilities early to unlock faster movement and smoother parkour transitions.
Complete Hunter Blinds and Symbiote Nests as soon as they appear for ability points.
Use Perfect Dodge windows to activate high-damage counterattacks.
Visit the Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man App often for city-wide events that reward tech parts.
updates: PC launch: January 30, 2025 with enhanced ray-tracing, DLSS 3, FSR 3 & frame generation.
New Game+ update includes 12 new suits, Ultimate Levels, Golden Gadget skins, and mission replay.
Stability improvements for PS5: December 2024 update improved performance mode’s frame pacing.
Photo Mode overhaul with new lighting tools, stickers, advanced camera controls.
Accessibility update introduced more colorblind options and customizable web-swinging speed.
PC Patch 1.2 adds HDR calibration, improved DualSense adaptive trigger support, and shader optimization.
features: Play as both Peter Parker and Miles Morales, each with unique abilities, gadgets, and skill trees.
Expanded open-world New York including Manhattan, Queens, Brooklyn, and Coney Island.
New Web-Wing gliding mechanics with wind tunnels for high-speed traversal.
Symbiote abilities for Peter including tendril attacks, Symbiote Surge, and rage-powered combos.
Bio-electric venom powers for Miles like Chain Lightning, Thunderburst, and Venom Punch.
Dynamic crime events that evolve depending on player progression.
Advanced boss battles featuring Venom, Lizard, Kraven, Mysterio, and more.
Near-instant character switching between Peter and Miles during open-world gameplay.
Suit Tech system for upgrading traversal, combat, and stealth efficiency.
Over 70 suits, including Original, Comic, Film, and Symbiote variants.
Expanded Photo Mode with depth-of-field, custom lighting, stickers, frames, and suit expression controls.
features_ps5: Ultra-fast SSD loading enabling near-instant character swapping.
DualSense adaptive triggers simulate web tension and Symbiote power resistance.
Haptic feedback for environmental effects like thunder, explosions, and gliding air pressure.
Three graphical modes: Fidelity (4K/30RT), Performance (4K/60), and Performance RT (40–60FPS with ray-tracing).
Tempest 3D audio for directional combat and city ambience.
features_pc: Unlocked framerates with DLSS 3, DLAA, XeSS, and FSR 3 support.
Ray-Traced Reflections, Ray-Traced Shadows, and Ray-Traced Global Illumination.
Multi-monitor & Ultra-wide support: 21:9, 32:9, 48:9 and triple-monitor modes.
Full keyboard/mouse remapping with customizable sensitivity curves.
Native support for DualSense (wired), Xbox controllers, and Steam Input.
Optional frame generation and upscaling for high-end GPUs.
Optimized CPU thread scheduling for stable high-FPS open-world traversal.
